section.title: Logging
section.para: The GSI-OpenSSH server logs to the system logger (syslog). Log messages from OpenSSH are unmodified in GSI-OpenSSH. GSI-specific log messages include:
section.screen: failed to map GSI user DN GSI user DN mapped to target user username GSI user DN is authorized as target user username GSI user DN is not authorized as target user username
section.para: In the messages above, DN is replaced with the client certificate subject distinguished name, and username is replaced with the local Unix username.
